document.title: I know a secret about Bitcoin...

4027b3eecf4caf6bff0740fbd72176af.content: This will not be an easy transition and many will fight against the change. I hope it doesn't lead to war, but it could, like the french revolution or other revolutions where the masses (representing more freedom) fight against the status quo that fears the disruption.

38ddf9ae0231c9ab0973dc97d2aefd6e.content: Most probably as often happens freedom will prevail and we'll have a grander, more beautiful, nicer world with less suffering and more love.

d2d80917a0050238308693ba2e7ac2eb.content: This is why the discussion about Bitcoin are so confusing. It's hard to see.

497844623099acd568016360169e9ebf.content: Hint: You will be reluctant to spend.

9579fbcdf3e25235901b48ea2747f437.content: It's not just another smoother or worse alternative to currency or whatever, forget about it, you think too linearly. Bitcoin is a completely new way to organize the economy. Bitcoin will change how we perceive the economy, you'll have to burn your economics books.
